column1: 18:21|5.20 pm - 6.21 pm: Miss Pettigrew found herself wafted into the passage. She was past remonstrance now
column4: expostulation. Her eyes shone. Her face glowed. Her spirits soared. Everything was happening too quickly. She couldn't keep up with things
column7: she could enjoy them.|Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day|Winifred Watson
